forgotPassword.title: Wuttu baatu-jàng
forgotPassword.subtitle: Dina nu la yónnee tegtal ci sa email
forgotPassword.success: Tegtal yi yónnee nañu ko ci sa email
forgotPassword.error: Munu ñu yónnee email bi. Saytu màkkaanu email bi
forgotPassword.instructions: Dugalal sa màkkaanu email te dina nu la yónnee tegtal ngir wuttu sa baatu-jàng.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Su màkkaanu email bi am ci ñu sistem bi, dinga jot tegtal ngir wuttu sa baatu-jàng.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Saytul sa boyet te toppaat tegtal yi ci email bi.

validation.emailRequired: Màkkaanu email bi dafa wara am

resetPassword.subtitle: Dugalal sa baatu-jàng bu bees
resetPassword.success: Baatu-jàng bi soppi na bu baax

error.weak: Baatu-jàng bi dafa war am lu ëpp 8 araf
error.tokenExpired: Jokkoo bi jeex na. Laaj beneen

resetPassword.invalidLinkMessage: Jokkoo bu wuttu baatu-jàng baaxul walla jeex na.
resetPassword.instructions: Dugalal sa baatu-jàng bu bees. Dafa war am lu ëpp 6 araf te amul ay araf yu gëna mag, yu ndaw ak ay nimero.
resetPassword.redirectMessage: Dina la yaw dellu ci dugg ci ay secondes...

verify.error: Njuumte ci saytu. Jokkoo bi mën na jeex
